markdownRemark.excerpt: Context Bicicultura is the biggest event about cycling culture in Brazil, and is hold every year in a different city. It brings together…

children.value: Bicicultura is the biggest event about cycling culture in Brazil, and is hold every year in a different city. It brings together discussions and workshops on the diverse theme of urban mobility, touching the cultural, social, political, artistic, economic and environmental. It’s organized by UCB, the biggest organization on ciclism in the country, and is helped by local groups.

In the past year the event was held in Recife, which I had the pleasure to visit per invitation to present my project Bike de Boa. In 2018 the event would be held in Rio de Janeiro, the city where I just moved to, and I had a personal will to contribute not only with another presentation but also with the organization. The group Transporte Ativo and its leader Zé Lobo are highly influential in the cicloativism scene and I was fortunate to know them already and it was easy offering help.

Considering the skills I had to offer we though it would be a great idea to develop a small app for the event. The official website was a simple Wordpress page, and I thought the user experience of checking the event schedule was far from great. Most of it was due budget limitations, so they wouldn’t even be able to print the schedule to offer the participants.
My objective then was to improve the experience for the event participants on checking the schedule, either if they were in their homes, planning their visit, or during the event

frontmatter.title: Bicicultura PWA
frontmatter.description: A simple web app for checking the schedule of Bicicultura, the biggest brazilian conference on bike culture.
